items: Debt recovery and protection from unfounded claims
Disputes with banks, MFIs, and collectors
Real Estate: transactions, arrests, eviction, pledge disputes
Representation in courts and enforcement proceedings

stats.title: Why clients choose QazPrime
stats.text: We specialize in protecting clients' interests in complex civil and economic disputes. Our goal is to achieve real results: recovery of money, protection of property, or conclusion of an amicable agreement.

about.title: Professional Legal Assistance
about.text: QazPrime is a law firm created for those who need real results, not theory. We work with debts, real estate, and disputes with banks and MFIs.

services.title: Complex questions require simple solutions
services.desc: We provide comprehensive legal support, focusing on protecting your assets and legal interests.

item_1.title: Debts, Credits, and MFIs
item_1.desc: Professional assistance in disputes with credit organizations. We know how to stop collector pressure, challenge illegal fines, and achieve real debt write-offs.

item_2.title: Court Disputes
item_2.desc: Comprehensive support of your interests in courts of all instances. From case analysis to control over the actual execution of the decision.

item_3.title: Real Estate
item_3.desc: Protecting your rights to housing and commercial objects. We ensure transaction security and help solve any housing conflicts legally.

item_4.title: Business and Contracts
item_4.desc: Legal foundation for your business. We help minimize risks in contracts and protect interests in disputes with counterparties.

item_5.title: Consumer Disputes
item_5.desc: Refund for low-quality or unprovided services. Specialists in disputes with online platforms, schools, and info-businesses.

item_6.title: Mediation
item_6.desc: Effective way of peaceful settlement of disputes with the participation of a neutral mediator. We help reach mutually beneficial agreements.

steps.title: Path to financial freedom
steps.step_01_desc: You leave an request or write on WhatsApp. We analyze your situation, look at documents, and explain options and risks.
steps.step_02_desc: We form a plan: claim, negotiations, mediation, court, enforcement proceedings. Discuss timeframes and budget.
steps.step_03_desc: Negotiate a contract, fix the scope of services and cost. Prepare documents, file in court, participate in hearings.
steps.step_04_desc: Get a court decision and achieve actual execution: recovery, eviction, removal of arrests.

reviews.title: Reviews about QazPrime
reviews.r1_text: Our company expresses gratitude for the high professionalism and quality of work in representing the company's interests in law enforcement agencies and in court.
reviews.r2_text: Our company expresses gratitude for the quality services provided and recommends them as a company that maximally satisfies customer requirements.
reviews.r3_text: We express huge gratitude for legal assistance in solving our issues in the Republic of Kazakhstan, representation in court and consultations.
reviews.r4_text: Applied for debt collection. QazPrime lawyers did complex work: from the claim to the actual receipt of money through the CSI.
reviews.r5_text: Helped write off debts through the bankruptcy procedure for individuals. The situation seemed hopeless, but the lawyers handled it properly.
reviews.r6_text: Ordered contract development for an IT project. Liked that the lawyers delve into the essence of the business instead of just using templates.

founder.name: Birzhan T. Zheksembekov
founder.subtitle: Founder of QazPrime, Lawyer and Professional Mediator
list: Practicing lawyer and professional mediator (out-of-court dispute resolution)
Specialization — court disputes, debt collection, and property protection
Representation in courts and support of enforcement proceedings
Practical approach: result-oriented and focused on peaceful conflict resolution
founder.quote: «My task is to protect your money and property, not just to "write a claim". I accompany the client to the result and explain every step in plain language.»

faq.title: Questions & Answers
faq.a1: We can briefly guide you on the situation for free. Detailed analysis with document review and strategy development is a paid service.
faq.q2: How much does a consultation cost?
faq.a2: Cost starts from 30,000 tenge and depends on the complexity of the issue and the volume of documents.
faq.q3: Can you handle a case remotely?
faq.a3: Yes, we work throughout Kazakhstan. Online consultations, electronic filing, and participation in courts via video call.
faq.a4: We guarantee quality legal work and the use of all legal tools to protect your interests.
faq.q5: Do you work with individuals or companies?
faq.a5: We assist both private individuals (debts, housing, family) and businesses (arbitration, debt collection, contracts).

contact.title: Contact me today
contact.desc: Don't let debts control your life. Fill out the form, and I will contact you within 15 minutes for a free analysis of the situation.
contact.privacy: By clicking the button, you agree to the personal data processing policy. Your data is reliably protected.
contact.success: Success! Your application has been sent.

footer.desc: Legal assistance in Almaty and throughout Kazakhstan. Protecting your interests is our work, which we do professionally.
